languages.text: "Я веду войну насмерть с ксеносами. Мои миры грабят и разоряют. Если это уличает меня в грехе — судите меня".
"I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."
languages.original_text: "Я веду войну насмерть с ксеносами. Мои миры грабят и разоряют. Если это уличает меня в грехе — судите меня".

traits.locale_text: "I am waging a war on xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me a sinner, then I invite you to be my judge."
"I am waging a war on xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me a sinner, then I invite you to be my judge."
"I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me a sinner, then I invite you to be my judge."
"I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me a sinner, then I invite you to be my judge."
"I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

languages.text: 「私は異種族と戦いを繰り広げている。死へと向かう戦いだ。私の星は異種族の略奪を受けて荒廃している。先ほどの理由で私に罪人の烙印を押すならば、お前には私の判事となってもらおうか」
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: 「私は異種族と戦いを繰り広げている。死へと向かう戦いだ。私の星は異種族の略奪を受けて荒廃している。先ほどの理由で私に罪人の烙印を押すならば、お前には私の判事となってもらおうか」

languages.text: “我正在与异形进行一场生死攸关的战争，我的领土正在遭到掠夺、毁灭。如果这一切只会让我背上叛徒的罪名，那我邀请你来做这场审判的仲裁官。”
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: “我正在与异形进行一场生死攸关的战争，我的领土正在遭到掠夺、毁灭。如果这一切只会让我背上叛徒的罪名，那我邀请你来做这场审判的仲裁官。”

languages.text: «Estoy librando una guerra contra los xenos, una guerra total. Saquean y asolan mis mundos. Si eso es motivo para acusarme de apostasía, le invito a que me juzgue».
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy librando una guerra contra los xenos, una guerra total. Saquean y asolan mis mundos. Si eso es motivo para acusarme de apostasía, le invito a que me juzgue».

languages.text: « Je suis en guerre contre les xénos, qui continuent à piller et dévaster mes mondes en ce moment même. Si cela fait de moi {mf|un apostat|une apostate}, alors je vous invite à être mon juge. »
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis en guerre contre les xénos, qui continuent à piller et dévaster mes mondes en ce moment même. Si cela fait de moi {mf|un apostat|une apostate}, alors je vous invite à être mon juge. »

languages.text: "Ich führe Krieg gegen die Xenos, einen Krieg bis zum Tode. Meine Welten werden geplündert und verwüstet. Wenn mich das {mf|zum|zur} Abtrünnigen macht, dürft Ihr gerne über mich zu Gericht sitzen."
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich führe Krieg gegen die Xenos, einen Krieg bis zum Tode. Meine Welten werden geplündert und verwüstet. Wenn mich das {mf|zum|zur} Abtrünnigen macht, dürft Ihr gerne über mich zu Gericht sitzen."

languages.text: "Zenolara karşı savaş veriyorum. Ölümüne bir savaş. Dünyalarım yağmalanıp harap ediliyor. Eğer bu yüzden dinden çıkmış ilan edileceksem yargıcım lütfen siz olun."
languages.original_text: "I am waging a war on the xenos, a war to the death. My worlds are being plundered and desolated. If that brands me an apostate, then I invite you to be my judge."

traits.locale_text: "Zenolara karşı bir savaş veriyorum. Ölümüne bir savaş. Dünyalarım yağmalanıyor ve harap ediliyor. Eğer bu yüzden dinden çıkmış ilan edileceksem, yargıcım lütfen siz olun."
